featured.text: The police officer showed us pictures of drunk driving accidents to highlight the importance of staying _____ on the road.
The adapted rides include the Off-Road Adventure, where guests can test their driving skills in sporty vehicles.
The basic structure of roads and bridges. (C) Knowledge and regulations about safe driving.

definition.zh_def: 駕駛，指操控車輛的行為。
definition.en_def: The act of operating and controlling a vehicle.
definition.example: He enjoys driving his car on the open road.
